```{r setup}
library(Rlibkdv)
data(hk)
```
## Examples

**Kernel Density Visualization**:

```{r}
resKDV <-kdv(hk$lon, hk$lat, 1000.0, 800, 640)
plotKDV(resKDV)
```


**Spatiotemporal Kernel Density Visualization**:

```{r}
resSTKDV <- stkdv(hk$lon,hk$lat,hk$t, 1000.0, 6.0, 800, 640, 32)
plotSTKDV(resSTKDV)
```
